intension: Design a thank you card for a company or organization to express gratitude for a donation. The illustration of a money jar and hearts is used to represent the act of donating. The message highlights the impact of the donation in helping change lives. The company name is also included in the text.
globalcaption: The image features a pink background with a white circle in the center. The circle is filled with hearts, and a hand is reaching out towards the circle. The hand is positioned on the left side of the circle, and the hearts are scattered around the circle, with some closer to the hand and others further away. The overall scene conveys a sense of connection and love.
keywords: donation, money, charity, donate, giving, save, jar, hearts, illustration, help, support, give, thankful, gratitude, phrase, instagram, post, insta, ig, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a pink circle in the center. Inside the circle, there is a hand holding a jar filled with hearts. The jar is placed on a table, and the hearts are scattered around it. The scene appears to be a simple yet playful representation of a person holding a jar filled with hearts

body.text: Your donation will help us change
lives. Thank you for your generosity.
